Articles.Content:
LibraCORE has moved HERE---> (Addon release)

 

Edited April 28, 2016 by John The Physicist
Are you still working on this? If so, do you plan to make Kerbol orbit Libra so that we can have proper interstellar travel?
hey was looking at this on kerbalstuff, i was wondering how is your mod going to work with the memory limitations of ksp? i love having more places to go to but kinda hard when you run out on memory.

On 1/9/2016 at 0:58 PM, MissMolly said:

hey was looking at this on kerbalstuff, i was wondering how is your mod going to work with the memory limitations of ksp? i love having more places to go to but kinda hard when you run out on memory. 

 

On 12/22/2015 at 11:14 AM, Sahadara said:

Are you still working on this? If so, do you plan to make Kerbol orbit Libra so that we can have proper interstellar travel?

Sorry for replying so late I have been very busy doing multiple things. To adress the first issue,

 

Yes I am still working on this, at least I am now. And.... well, I really don't want to make Kerbol orbit Libra or another star, blackhole and whatnot YET, because there is major bugs that happen when you do it. However, I had contacted the Kerbal Galactic mod owner, and might contact other interstellar Kopernicus mods, to just put Libra in there. But for now, I would like to finish my Gliese-581 system and my Solar System!

 

        MissMolly, Kopernicus doesn't take TOO much memory... well, kind of anyway. One solar system won't run your game out of memory. Gosh, I had a whole galaxy with other packs and it didn't run my game out. But I wouldn't be suprised if it were able to make your game crash-happy. To combat this, I am seperating my solar systems into planet packs, i.e. Gliese-581, Sonne System and so on.

 

Hope my answers helped and again, sorry for getting at them so late!

~John
John could you post this somewhere so it is available for download?  Much thanks

4 hours ago, jpinard said:

John could you post this somewhere so it is available for download?  Much thanks

I am getting this on SpaceDock right now!

Well, all of my progress on Gliese-581 is gone because of well... it was on *, and I never got the torrent because my internet is so bad and I didn't have a torrent program at the time, which is unusul because I us.... ahem, anyways, I don't have any of the files, so I'll need to remake that too. Fun!

Edited December 20, 2017 by ThiccRocketScientist
Oh that is awful!  I wish I had the files myself to send you to help you get back faster.
